title: Inquiry-Based Science Education Instructional Design Workshop: A Language-Integrated Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theory, teaching experience, and basic competency in academic writing/presentation
context.additional_context: Inquiry-based science education methodology for adult learners, prioritizing instructional design competency enhancement through linguistic interaction (discussions, report writing, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can verbally explain the core principles and instructional strategies of inquiry-based science education.
Learners can develop and apply text-based materials when designing lessons utilizing science process skills (observation, experimentation, analysis, etc.).
Learners can enhance self-efficacy and beliefs about inquiry-based lessons through verbal reflection and feedback via project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
